dict.acceptation: 护士，看护；奶妈，保姆，阿妈，保育员；保护人，培养者，养成所，发祥地；[植]保护树，[虫]保护虫，保育虫，[动]世代交替的无性期的个体；

sent.orig: NURSE ANESTHETIST – a registered nurse who has satisfactorily completed an accredited nurse anesthesia training program.
sent.trans: 参加了公认的麻醉护士培训计划并取得合格的注册护士。

sent.orig: A male nurse who runs a ward, by the way, is known as a charge nurse.
sent.trans: 一个照看病房的男性护士，依据（女护士）的叫法，被称为：管理护士（或叫：护士长。

sent.orig: The head nurse was reduced to ordinary nurse due to malpractice.
sent.trans: 这位护士长由于玩忽职守被降职为普通护士。

sent.orig: Nurse false: Male employee's spouse grow and give nurse false for male employee's 3 dayses.
sent.trans: 看护假：男员工配偶生育，给予男员工3天看护假。

sent.orig: She had to engage a wet nurse because she could not nurse the child herself.
sent.trans: 她不得不请一位奶妈，因为她自己不能喂孩子。
